domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies

text:
@CDCgov If a person with covid19 sneezes or coughs in your face your eyes should be covered too. Clearly a box, head might be a new consumer fad. Clear breathing box hat for whole head. Gloves and fully clothed. Box hat zoot suits one piece with trap door.
Thinking can be harshly trendy.
